Reviews.Title: Great spy pen camera for the money!
Reviews.Author: ron
Reviews.Content: I've tried a bunch of spy pens ranging in price from $39 to $149. The lower priced spy pens are crap. Video quality is spotty and they sometimes work, sometimes dont. I found the video quality on this pen to be really great and  I found it easy to use. The instruction manual was very easy to follow (I've received a few spy pens with manuals that were literally written in chinese). All in all, great value and a great spy pen. Would recomend.

Reviews.Title: spy pen
Reviews.Author: Daniel Rayburn
Reviews.Content: very light weight, easy to use. Surprised how simple it was to hookup to laptop and view the files. Good purchase

Reviews.Title: This works better than I thought possible
Reviews.Author: Kevin Piette
Reviews.Content: I ordered this pen to satisfy a number of interesting criteria. I needed a high quality audio and video recorder 'spy device' for this youtube series I had planned out. I didn't just want a prop though, I wanted to incorporate clips from the camera. I got this pen straight from their website (gadgetshack.com I think) and It was a dream working with their customer service. I wasn't expecting much, but the video on this thing rivals a smartphone. Most importantly though, the audio is nice and clear. I needed good audio more than anything else and this pen really delivered. I can hear myself talking clearly, but even though my pen is in my pocket its not disproportionately loud to what I'm trying to recordHere are some stuff I noticed while using it...- it comes with a 8gb micro sd card for storing data. I had a 32 micro laying around from an old phone and I can store a stupid amount of data on my pen now, and pop it in my phone to look at the pictures or videos.- the pen works!- everything is timestamped, you can modify the date and time too (a big plus for my spy movie, it takes place in the past)for video: its in 720p. this is acceptable for me, as its a high enough quality to make out license plates and things in the right light, but not so high of a resolution to take up a ton of space on the memory card.theres a motion detection mode I only just learned how to use... it detects motion in front of the camera and starts recording. This actually works pretty well, I stuck my pen in a flower pot and walked by it and lo and behold, I got an hd video of my feetthe camera is a little harder to use for me, but I didn't need the camera function anyway.truly an awesome product!

Reviews.Title: Think twice.
Reviews.Author: Hookdriver
Reviews.Content: First one the ink did not work. Returned with no hassles. 2nd one the ink works fine but for the money, the quality is low. The video quality is like a decade old. It is better than some out there, but for $100 the picture/video quality should be much better.

Reviews.Title: short battery life when motion-detection activated
Reviews.Author: Derek W. Hoiem
Reviews.Content: On the plus side, the quality of video and audio recordings is good for such a small device.  Also, the device easily passes for (and functions as) a pen, so it could be used for discrete recordings.On the negative side, I had hoped to use the motion-activated recording mode to station the device and record whenever something moves in it's field of vision, but the battery life is too short.  For example, I thought you could make it face a cat door and record video whenever the cat comes in and out.  The problem is that the battery dies in ~1.5 hours whether or not any motion is detected.  I thought that it would record for 1.5 hours and not use much battery in between recordings.I am returning it.

Reviews.Title: wish battery life was longer.
Reviews.Author: Sherri Degler
Reviews.Content: It works ok, but sometimes it shuts off after I turn it on. The battery life isn't that long. I was looking for something that would go as long as 6 to 8 hours.

Reviews.Title: Little pen camera that could.
Reviews.Author: Dan S.
Reviews.Content: Setting up and operating the camera worked exactly as shown in the manual and was super easy. Recording quality and functionality were also perfect.

Reviews.Title: Amazing spy pen!
Reviews.Author: Lindsay Nowak
Reviews.Content: This spy pen is amazing!  It's so easy to use, and the quality is really great.  I highly recommend it!!

Reviews.Title: good quality
Reviews.Author: DRED
Reviews.Content: good quality pen and the picture is pretty good for a small pinhole cam, better than I expected for sure.

Reviews.Title: Better then expected..
Reviews.Author: Darleene Ward
Reviews.Content: I always buy gadgets like this with a healthy dose of skepticism. But I must say I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of video produced by this little pen. Set up was super easy thanks to an (overly) detailed instruction manual. The lighting takes a while to understand and get used to. But once you have it figured out how to use it, this pen is super easy to use. I'd highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Covert + Video + Motion Detection = Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Conor
Reviews.Content: I just received one of these as a birthday present and I must say I am impressed! The video quality is on-par with my iPhone 4 and it was super easy to setup, use and then download the videos to my laptop (the instructions were well written). The coolest feature for me is the motion detection feature. You can set it to record only when it detects motion, it saves a lot of battery power and lets you leave the video pen unattended while it can still record. This is perfect because my wife and I needed a "covert" nanny cam and this seems to fit the bill, plus it was affordable!Speaking from firsthand experience it was a great gift, thanks Mom! :)

Reviews.Title: As described
Reviews.Author: Zachary M.
Reviews.Content: I was reluctant to buy a pen camera for $100, but it works perfectly. It picks up sound and has a great camera installed. Looking at those ten dollar ones- those are crap. This was expensive, but it was definitely worth it.

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: Louise Roberts
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my gadget loving boyfriend and I have to say we were both very impressed with the quality. It provides high clarity imaging with the videos. He had had one before this and he said it was dreadful in comparison. It definitely seems more worthwhile to buy the higher priced items and it is more than true with this product. Very happy!Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Confused?
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: The pen looks nice... but no instructions came with it? How do I record? how do I enable motion detection? I see orange and blue lights from it. Can someone instruct me on the ways to execute this thing?

Reviews.Title: Pen cam ok
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: It's ok.  I wish I could control the lens better on the subject I a pic of.  If in shirt pocket it tends to capture the subject to high and only get top of the head.  I've only have used the video, not the snapshot.

Reviews.Title: Defective or bad design
Reviews.Author: Just a guy
Reviews.Content: I am and always have been a geek. No gadget is too out there for me to try. This item I could get it to record sometimes but never with sound. The next time doing the same thing it would not work. To top that off to view the video on a PC you have to have video codex's installed to match.I sent it back....

Reviews.Title: this message will self destruct in 5, 4, 3...
Reviews.Content: I've only used this pen on a handful of missions, but so far it's worked great. Looks like a pen and it even writes too. I can't get into too many details as I'm mostly involved in clandestine operations. That said, I've successful ran a few black bag jobs, capturing some serious high-res intel in the process. It's one button operation makes it pretty easy to use, which is key when I'm in the field. The LED feedback is useful, but once you get the hang of it, covering it with a little black tape will ensure that you're not outed. I picked up the pen this morning after leaving it with an asset in Motion Detect mode and the take was huge. Battery lasted about 90 minutes, as advertised. Price is higher than some of the competition, but you get what you pay for. This should be standard issue for all agents.

Reviews.Title: Novelty pen camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel Lita
Reviews.Content: This product is far from "professional" as described in title. Unreliable - failed to record when needed the most although checked the light changing sequence twice. Short battery life - you can't record more than 1.5 hours fully charged. This is the second pen camera I bought and the last one. First was the "amazing pen" or something similar for $39.99. Problematic as well - use to freeze often even after pressing the reset button. By the way, I did not noticed any difference in video/photo quality between the "amazing pen" and "professional pen" as advertised. I'm returning it tomorrow. It's ok as a toy but If this product is intended for "professional" use, the instructions should read "Good luck!" and get ready to be fired!

Reviews.Title: Battery only last 1 hour but everything else is pretty good
Reviews.Author: Fred Li
Reviews.Content: The video's image and sound quality is very good even comparing to a normal video camera. The product description says the battery can last 3 hours when fully charged. In reality, it lasts only 1 hour. Also, I couldn't get the photo function or the motion sensor function to work. Overall, the product is OK but it is a bit too expensive for its short battery time. I returned mine. I would have kept it if the price is $50 instead of $100. Or I would have kept it and give it a 5-star rating if the battery really last 3 hours. When I bought it, there were 11 reviews, all of which gave 5-star ratings. I don't know how that happened.

Reviews.Title: Great quality and excellent service
Reviews.Author: LuckyJ NYC
Reviews.Content: Works great. I was concerned it would be very thick from the pics but it looks and works like a regular pen. Quick responsive customer service as well. I appreciate the follow up emails.

Reviews.Title: very cool
Reviews.Author: M. Pomada
Reviews.Content: i love electronic gadgets & whenever i'm buying electronic gadgets online i always get nervous i'm going to get ripped off. i hate trying to return things. so i tend to stay away from the low cost options because the quality is always horrible & sooner or later the reviews will indicate that & the product will be taken down from amazon. when i looked for a spy pen, i looked for a price point that indicated high quality combined with good reviews. i've had the pen for about a week & i love it! now i can attest to the fact that the people who built this pen obviously cared a great deal about creating a great product & given the vast number of available micro cameras you can see the quality & reliability of the HD video is amazing. i haven't experienced any problems clearly present in the lower cost spy pens. i wholeheartedly recommend this product to anyone, but particularly those who don't want to waste their time & money getting ripped off by a lower quality product.

Reviews.Title: Sweet item
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: Bought this pen as a novelty present to be honest, the idea of one seems really cool, and a fun item to have, its just finding things to use it for that can be tricky. The pen has great quality (Picture and sound), and manages to store tons of data! The thing that really swayed me was the lifetime guarantee, at least i know ill always have a working item! Good/funny gift idea, or if you fancy doing some spying aha, would recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great recorder!
Reviews.Author: elisabeth
Reviews.Content: This video-recording pen is so much better than I expected. I've been through countless pens like this and either they break quickly or they had horrible image/video quality - usually both. This camera/video pen is very high quality and the images and videos look great. I was very pleased with how real the pen looked and at how much it can hold. The instruction manual was easy and it got right to the point. Other instructions usually consist of a lot of confusing words and are unusually long - and for no reason. I highly recommend this video-recoring pen. It was a great buy! It is definitely worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: Alexis Jimenez
Reviews.Content: Not what i was espected bad pictures quality, very Hard to know when is taking a picture or recoring video, poor instruccions.

Reviews.Title: awesine product & great customer service
Reviews.Author: Steven D. Bridges
Reviews.Content: awesome item with excellent video and sound quality. This is my second HD spy pen.  My first one didn't work.  contacted guardline direct and their customer service help me out even though I did not by the product from them.  I highly recommend this item and this company.  Great professional service and outstand product

Reviews.Title: IS IT REALLY 8MP & 720P ?
Reviews.Author: Gorkem Kebir
Reviews.Content: HeyI just started to use this device under yellow light and can barely sayit is not 8mp.Are you sure that this is really 8mp?The video recording is just like 300p.So now I feel frustrated!

Reviews.Title: Bought this as a present, now I want one!
Reviews.Author: D.L. Cook
Reviews.Content: I read all of the reviews for the other "Spy" Pens and this one seemed to be the best.  Before buying on Amazon I went to Best Buy to see if they had them so I could demo it.  I showed this picture to the sales person at Best Buy and said "Do you sell these?" Sales Person said "No, but I wish we did!"Person I bought it for loves it!

Reviews.Title: great addition to have!!!
Reviews.Author: Y. klein "masterel"
Reviews.Content: what a beautiful little tool! this makes it so easy for me to carry everywhere I go… it takes the load off.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Laurie
Reviews.Content: This is not one of those cheap, poor quality bargain purchases.Happy with it out of the box and I am usually not great with tech items.This is a quality item. It works simply and the picture is great!!Seems solid. Happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Jason B.
Reviews.Content: Works and acts just as descrbed. Very happy :). Product arrived early, who can complain about that! Works perfectly without a hitch. For the price? Amazing. Thank you very much. Will definetly order from this group again!

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Doug R
Reviews.Content: Charged it fully and used it. Camera shut off after only 15 minutes. Re-charged it fully and again it shut off after only 15 minutes so the claim that this can go 90 minutes recording is not necessarily true.

Reviews.Title: Did not function out of the box.
Reviews.Author: Brian Atlanta
Reviews.Content: There is a little LED light on the pen which tells you when it is on, what mode it is in, etc. This light never worked on the pen I got. The product looked great and would not have drawn attention in a pen stand.

Reviews.Title: It doesn't work!
Reviews.Author: Francisco Roberto De Melo Benigno
Reviews.Content: This product was sent to my address in the US, and then it was consolidated and forwarded to my address in Brazil. Due to this process I only received this product today. For my surprise it didn't work at all! When I openned the pen I found two  loose pieces of a what should be a contact for the other side of the usb device. Worst of all is that I don't have means to send it back to the manufacturer to be serviced. This is the first time I have trouble with something bought from Amazon. I'm begining to admit I just lost $99.00 plus taxes and freight !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: assembly problem
Reviews.Author: Kracina Lancaster
Reviews.Content: The spy pen is missing a part around the USB. This makes it difficult to assemble. The price is extremely high for missing parts

Reviews.Title: Not real HD Pen. For the price.
Reviews.Author: Jhern4690 "Hernandez"
Reviews.Content: I purchase this pen because it is listed as a a HD Professional grande spy pen. But it's picture quality is not much better that Night Owl pen cam that cost only $30. All you get is a wider image that us not HD since the video quiality is exacly the same a micro SD slot and that does not justify the price.

Reviews.Title: Battery life too short
Reviews.Author: Lynx
Reviews.Content: Battery life is too short just 2 hours. Video and audio is ok for the size. Product was returned to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: It works adequately and smooth connection to computer/laptop
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and works. The quality for the video is adequate. Setting the time stamp is also easy.Could be cheaper though than $100. Maybe its actually worth $70.Yeah sure I recommended it, if you could spare the money.This one is for my husband.

Reviews.Title: Solid pen cam
Reviews.Author: Lynne Rey
Reviews.Content: I've tried a few of these pen cams and I'd say the Guardline is a solid choice. Most the pens in the market are cheap and low end. You can "feel" the quality when you pick up and hold this one. The video quality is quite good. The only reason I'm giving it 4 out of 5 stars is because I was a bit disappointed in the picture taking functionality. You have to hold the pen super still, otherwise the pictures turn out shaky and blurred. But again, the video function was great.

Reviews.Title: Bulky and east to spot
Reviews.Author: Marilyn A. Campbell "govpurchaser"
Reviews.Content: I wanted to record conversations so I could review and make sure I heard what I thought I heard but not so that the other person would know - not that I was doing anything wrong with the recording. However, this pen is too bulky, hard to write with and a blinking light makes people ask why is your pen blinking? I also need a camera to record things at a dinner table when a pen would be hard to explain and the pen is okay to wear on your lapel but again, the blinking light. I would not recommend this item for these reasons.

Reviews.Title: still  need to learn
Reviews.Author: Kun Skilling
Reviews.Content: i  never  try  use the prn  because  there is no  light  on the pen  when its on,so i  need some  feed  back

Reviews.Title: Great Quality!!
Reviews.Author: Stanley "Stanley"
Reviews.Content: Pretty amazing item - much better then expected from a small device.Solid - very happy with the purchase.  Received it very quickly.Worth the higher price - you get what you pay forStanley

Reviews.Title: Sub Standard
Reviews.Author: Maruti
Reviews.Content: Unclear in low light environmentsSub standard footage in normal light environments.Not what i would expect from a premium priced pen

Reviews.Title: Junk product
Reviews.Author: BenGi
Reviews.Content: Dont recomend to buy it, it is great as just a pen but nothing elseDon't wast your hard earned money, use your smart phone if you need

Reviews.Title: I'm not satisfied with this product
Reviews.Author: Oleg Kavulych
Reviews.Content: The pen has scratches.and actually look like camera has been moved by somebody.and the box was open before.and I didn't do the video yet,I hope at least this will be good.
